name: Marble Epic Shooter
description:
It is kind of marble shoot is a delightful and unique matching game, and make the game much more interesting and challenging. Marble Epic Shooteris defense and popper the temple avoid the invasion of the alien marble

Features:
- Play it in fragment time or long time
- Easy to play but have a lot of fun
- Match three or more bubbles of same color to destroy
- Up to 200 levels
